#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <iostream>
 
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
 
void solve()
{
	int N;
	scanf("%d",&N);
	ll ans = 0;
	ll t = 5;
	while(N > 0)
	{
		if(N & 1)
			ans += t;
			
		t *= 5;
		N >>= 1;
	}
	printf("%lld\n",ans);
	return;
}
 
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		solve();
	}
	return 0;
}
